itunes:title: S3, E20: Intentional Conversations: Heather and Carlos Whittaker
title: S3, E20: Intentional Conversations: Heather and Carlos Whittaker
itunes:author: That Sounds Fun Network
itunes:subtitle: Do you feel disconnected as a family? Every season of parenting brings obstacles to connection. Join Sissy Goff and David Thomas this week on the  for a fun and hope-filled conversation with author and podcaster Carlos Whittaker and his wife, Heather,...
itunes:summary:
Do you feel disconnected as a family? Every season of parenting brings obstacles to connection. Join Sissy Goff and David Thomas this week on the Raising Boys & Girls podcast for a fun and hope-filled conversation with author and podcaster Carlos Whittaker and his wife, Heather, on being a connected parent.

Grab links, stats, and quotes you want to remember in the show notes at https://www.gominno.com/blog/raising-boys-and-girls-podcast-heather-carlos-whittaker-interview

Connect with Sissy, David, and Melissa at raisingboysandgirls.com

Connect with Minno at podcast.gominno.com

Do you feel disconnected as a family? Every season of parenting brings obstacles to connection.
